response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your operations or personal needs significantly. Given its exceptional capabilities and versatility, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. Considering the unique benefits it offers, I am extending you an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $18,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty, dedicated customer support, and access to future updates at no additional cost. I trust that you will find the investment worthwhile and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 18000}
